ComicInfo.Penciller: Mike Zeck,Steve Ditko,Steve Ditko,Demetrio Sánchez Gómez,Zeck
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Dead Will Live Again!: Dr. Victor Strogoff's castle is stormed by townsfolk who do not like his experiments.
Mr. Ober's Nightmare: Mr. Ober is sent here to open the doorway for an invasion from another dimension.
Men of Magic: Information about famous stage magicians.
A Grizzly End: Katrina makes friends with a bear in the forest.
ComicInfo.Tags: Jean Eugène Robert-Houdin,Countess Von Bludd,Cagliostro,Harry Houdini,Merlin
